DOC.brief_title: A Multiple Ascending Dose Study BMS-707035 HIV-1 Infected Subjects
DOC.criteria: HIV1infected subject CD4+ lymphocyte count ≥ 200 cells/mm3 plasma HIV1 RNA ≥ 5000 copies/mL antiretroviral ( ARV ) therapy ≥ 8 week naive ARV , otherwise medically stable determined medical history , physical examination , 12 lead electrocardiogram , clinical laboratory evaluation eligible participate study . In addition , subject must prior exposure Integrase Inhibitor class compound . Female subject must nurse , pregnant , childbearing potential
